faq.answer: Yes, ground-mount installations in Brimfield require building permits and must comply with local zoning including setback requirements. Our team handles all permitting with the Town of Brimfield and Hampden County, ensuring your system meets all Massachusetts codes and regulations.

faq.answer: Ground-mount systems require minimal maintenance - typically annual inspections and occasional cleaning (2-4 times yearly). The ground-level access makes maintenance much easier than rooftop systems. Most Brimfield customers find rain naturally cleans panels, with occasional clearing of leaves or snow.
